name: Techno Demon- Floor One
description:
You play as a volunteer in a small simulation. Your task is simple, get to the end and get paid, though you do have a feeling you're not being told the full truth, there's nothing much you can do about it now.  So far we only have floor one fully built, but I'm sure you can figure it out.

Floor one- The Spider Demon

Collect 90 pieces of code to escape Duvessa.
